name: ba-workflow-tools
description: Complete toolkit for Business Analysts: sprint planning, velocity tracking, MoSCoW prioritization, release dates, fiscal quarters, user story formatting, timezone tools, estimation converters, and text utilities. Solves real BA workflow problems.

fiscal_year_start_month.title: Fiscal Year Start Month
fiscal_year_start_month.description: Month your fiscal year starts (1-12). UK=4 (April), US=10 (October), Calendar year=1 (January)

default_sprint_length.title: Default Sprint Length (weeks)
default_sprint_length.description: Your standard sprint length in weeks

point_to_hour_ratio.title: Hours per Story Point
point_to_hour_ratio.description: How many hours equals one story point in your team

overhead_factor.title: Overhead Factor
overhead_factor.description: Overhead as decimal (0.2 = 20% for meetings, ceremonies, etc.)

tools.name: calculate_working_days
tools.description: Calculate working days between two dates (excludes UK weekends and bank holidays)

tools.name: add_working_days
tools.description: Add working days to a date (accounts for weekends and holidays)

tools.name: subtract_working_days
tools.description: Subtract working days from a date (accounts for weekends and holidays)

tools.name: calculate_sprint_dates
tools.description: Generate multiple sprint dates with start/end dates and working days per sprint

tools.name: calculate_release_date
tools.description: Estimate release date based on remaining story points, team velocity, and sprint length

tools.name: calculate_velocity
tools.description: Calculate team velocity with adjustments for holidays, team size, and capacity changes

tools.name: calculate_fiscal_quarter
tools.description: Get fiscal quarter, fiscal year, and quarter dates (UK fiscal year default, configurable)

tools.name: format_user_story
tools.description: Format requirements into proper user story structure (Requirement, Placement, Behavior, Acceptance Criteria)

tools.name: calculate_moscow_priority
tools.description: MoSCoW priority breakdown: counts, story points, and percentages by Must/Should/Could/Won't

tools.name: plan_moscow_capacity
tools.description: Plan sprint capacity based on MoSCoW priorities - shows what fits in available capacity

tools.name: validate_moscow_dependencies
tools.description: Validate MoSCoW dependencies - finds issues like Must-haves depending on Could-haves or Won't items

tools.name: generate_requirement_ids
tools.description: Generate requirement ID sequences with consistent format (e.g., REQ-001, US-045, etc.)

tools.name: convert_points_to_hours
tools.description: Convert story points to hours with configurable ratio and overhead factor (default: 4h per point, 20% overhead)

tools.name: convert_estimation
tools.description: Convert between estimation systems: T-shirt sizes (XS/S/M/L/XL/XXL) ↔ Story Points ↔ Hours

tools.name: convert_timezone
tools.description: Convert time between timezones (supports GMT, EST, PST, AEST, CET, MYT, and more)

tools.name: find_meeting_time
tools.description: Find suitable meeting times that work across multiple timezones and working hours

tools.name: text_utilities
tools.description: Text operations: word count, char count, remove duplicates, sort, extract emails/URLs, case conversion, and more
